dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4196 IH: African Union Diplomatic Parity Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Olszewski (for himself and Mr. Huizenga) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To extend certain privileges and immunities to the Permanent Observer Mission of the African Union to the United Nations in New York.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the African Union Diplomatic Parity Act.

section.header: Extension of certain privileges and immunities to the African Union
section.text: Section 12(b) of the International Organizations Immunities Act (22 U.S.C. 288f–2(b)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking extend, to the African Union Mission and inserting
by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

to the Permanent Observer Mission of the African Union to the United Nations in New York, and to its members, the privileges and immunities enjoyed by the permanent missions to the United Nations of member states, and their members, subject to corresponding conditions and obligations.
